description: a(n) = smallest integer k such that harmonic mean of n and k is an integer.
comments: If a(n)<>n then n is in A005279
example: a(6)=2 because harmonic mean of 6 and 2 is 3 which is an integer and harmonic mean of 6 and 1 is 12/7 which is not an integer
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 20 2000
